614870.name: Detective Butler: Maiden Voyage Murder - Soundtrack
614870.description:
The complete soundtrack for the murder mystery visual novel Detective Butler: Maiden Voyage Murder.

Contains 29 tracks in 128kbps mp3 format for a total duration of 1 hour and 3 minutes.
